name: Vaccinator (herb64)
description:
Save the world from the virus. I created this game during one week in my first participation at the Epic Megajam 2020.  You steer your vaccination ship through human veins and need to kill viruses along the way.

For sound effects and the menu sound loop, I used the following CC0 licensed sounds:

https://freesound.org/people/Jerimee/sounds/521776/
https://freesound.org/people/Julien%20Matthey/sounds/346918/
https://freesound.org/people/Leszek_Szary/sounds/146725/
https://freesound.org/people/pointparkcinema/sounds/407235/
https://freesound.org/people/CarlosCAV/sounds/457536/
https://freesound.org/people/SansArt/sounds/430612/
https://freesound.org/people/Kreastricon62/sounds/323526/
https://freesound.org/people/SlykMrByches/sounds/55234/
https://freesound.org/people/PaynesBeats/sounds/249730/

Have fun and stay healthy
